page.title: 09Road System in Beccles.
page.content: During the past few years there have been many changes to the patterns of roads in and around Beccles.The main changes have been the opening of the By-Pass which takes traffic on the main Norwich to Lowestoft road away from the town centre.A new bridge was opened two years ago over the River Waveney as part of this by-pass. Road changes made in the centre of the town recently have not proved popular with towns people though.These are meant to be experimental but many people think that they will be permanant and are very unhappy at what they see to be the ruining of a small market town by messing about with the flow of traffic.
